products.name: PROPHET FROM KIMBERLEY TEE Red 90.00 EUR
products.details: This boxy red tee in 100% South African cotton features a print of a popular poster found in Downtown Johannesburg, screen printed in an off-white colour. A small brown tape holds the poster up

products.name: NAVY SISTERHOOD HOODIE Blue 260.00 EUR
products.details: This plush boxy hoodie is emblazoned with a distressed iteration of our Sisterhood Emblem. The hoodie features a pronounced kangaroo pocket on the front hem. Finished with matching ribbing on all hems

products.name: LONGLINE SISTERHOOD GOLFER DRESS Blue 295.00 EUR
products.details: The Sisterhood Golfer Dress is emblazoned with the Sisterhood Emblem on its center front with straps that emerge from the side seam for proportion shifting. The straps may either be left hanging or tie towards the back. White banding on the sleeve and button-stand frame the dress

products.name: Name: SLEEVELESS COLLARBONE KNITTED DRESS Black 675.00 EUR
products.details: This sensual fine-rib knitted dress features a dropped hip, which flares out into technical knitted pleats that end mid-calf. A scooped neckline reveals the collarbone, and a turtleneck is grown on from the back, creating a sophisticated New Victoria neckline

products.name: SISTERHOOD SHORTS Navy 240.00 EUR
products.details: These knee-length pair of boxy shorts are emblazoned with a small stamp of our Sisterhood Emblem on the bottom right hem. The elasticated waistband features a drawcord for further fit adjustment

products.name: STRAPPY SISTERHOOD GOLFERS Tangerine 250.00 EUR

products.name: OLIVE KNITTED TROUSERS Olive 250.00 EUR

products.name: SISTERHOOD KNIT GOLFER Black and White 295.00 EUR

products.name: SUNDAY BEST BOOT- ANKLE LENGTH Black 999.00 EUR
products.details: The brands first shoe offering is titled the Sunday Best Boot, and is available in an ankle length and a knee length. The boot takes elements from a loafer, and features a severely pointed toe - inspired by the elongated shoes pastors wear in downtown Johannesburg and the shape of 15th Century Cracow shoes. The shoes feature our brand’s logo - the Sisterhood Emblem - attached to its front, crafted in a domed stainless steel. The heel takes on an angular wedge shape that grows out in a trapeze fashion towards the ground. The shoe’s sole is stamped with the brand’s monogram

products.name: Savage X Pride Rib Crop Top Night Gram Grey 13.99 USD

SXF will make a flat donation of $250,000 from the sale of the June Pride capsule collection that will be distributed among five organizations supporting LGBTQIA+ communities, in partnership with Clara Lionel Foundation (CLF). To learn more about the grant-recipient organizations: The Audre Lorde Project, The Caribbean Equality Project, INC., GLAAD, Trans Latin@ Coalition & Trans Wellness Center, go to ClaraLionelFoundation.org
